FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our unique toilet marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the toilet marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our platform connects toilet sellers with buyers, allowing users to browse, compare, and purchase a wide variety of toilets from different manufacturers and sellers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of toilets are available?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse range of toilets, including standard, eco-friendly, smart toilets, bidets, and luxury models to suit various preferences and budgets.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't provide installation directly, we can connect you with certified plumbers in your area who can professionally install your new toilet.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused toilets in their original packaging. Custom orders may have different terms, which will be clearly stated at the time of purchase.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we ship to many countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on the destination. Please check our shipping information page for more details.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: ToiletTrader connects toilet buyers and sellers in a user-friendly marketplace. Browse listings, compare prices, and make secure transactions for new and used toilets.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What types of toilets can I find on ToiletTrader?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our marketplace offers a wide variety of toilets, including standard, low-flow, composting, and luxury models. You can find both new and gently used options to suit your needs and budget.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is it safe to buy a used toilet?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, when proper precautions are taken. We encourage sellers to thoroughly clean and sanitize used toilets before listing. We also recommend buyers to inspect and sanitize their purchases. Always follow local health guidelines when dealing with used plumbing fixtures.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How do I list my toilet for sale on ToiletTrader?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Listing your toilet is easy! Simply create an account, click 'Sell a Toilet,' and follow the prompts to add photos, description, and pricing. Our platform will help you connect with potential buyers in your area.
